text.page:
231
096-116a @#/ /'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta da p+ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha rma d+hA tu ga r+b+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni/ hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha rnams dga' zhing bsrung ngo / /nag po'i bdud thams cad dang bzhing brgyal lo/ /dregs pa ma rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang

232
096-116b brgyal lo/ /bdud skrag par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
